hiveArticle.title: When Steemit made you a Billionaire
hiveArticle.body:
A Glitch in Steemit made us all Millionaire, Billionaire or Trillionaire. Though it was a wrong calculation, but it made is think that we are a billionaire.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdc144UU5HW5CzXWCfvf9zauRwxy166NJjkGsUrwvfjCA/image.png)

What you can get if you have so much money, I think 1000s of Lamborghini for everyone.
